oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Tom T. Hall - Band rehearsal - 2005-08-02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Band rehearsal for first Artist in Residence performance by Tom T. Hall from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 2, 2005.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tom T. Hall; Charlie McCoy; Peter Cooper; Pat Flynn;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Includes talking through musical arrangements. Rehearsal includes: Old Dogs, Children And Watermelon Wine [partial] with Tom T. Hall -- Long recorded break when Tom T. leaves [Mostly talking in background] -- Another run through of Old Dogs, Children and Watermelon -- Talking through other song arrangements -- Vocal harmony rehearsal -- Old Dogs, Children and Watermelon Wine (Peter Cooper - vocal).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hall, Tom. T.; McCoy, Charlie, 1941-; Cooper, Peter; Flynn, Pat; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
